entry.title: Honey Rose Gulkand
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pettikadai
Type: Natural
Price: 395.00

A sweet rose preserve, Pettikadai's Rose gulkand is a labour of love. Made exclusively with the Indian demask rose petals which blossom only twice a year, these natural Kodaikanal forest wonders are collected by the local tribals. Rose petals, organic Khus khus, dried black grapes, cucumber seeds and raw wild honey are sun cooked for over a period of 48 days. A powerful antioxidant and anti-inflammatory, a teaspoon of gulkand in warm milk before sleep is just the thing for a restful sleep. Make your everyday a little more healthier with our Gulkand!

INGREDIENTS

 Indian Damask Rose Petals, Khus Khus, Cucumber Seeds, Raw Wild Honey, Dry Black Grapes

HOW CAN YOU USE ?

1. As it is 2. Whip it up with Cold Cow Milk

SHELF LIFE

6 Months

entry.title: Organic Naval Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vibis Honey Bee Farm
Type: Natural
Price: 350.00

Naval Honey is sourced from Naval flowers.Naval honey is used for Treating Ulcers & Reducing Blood Sugar Levels.It's rich in vitamin C and consuming foods rich in vitamin c helps with effective iron absorption. For women who are deficient in iron consuming naval honey will greatly help with iron absorption.

Ingredients

 Naval Honey

Storage Instruction

Store in an airtight container in a dry place, away from direct sunlight.Do not Refrigerate

Shelf life

24 months

entry.title: Amla Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vibis Honey Bee Farm
Type: Veg
Price: 260.00

The Indian gooseberry popularly known as Amla in the north & Nellikkai in the south is one of nature's nutrient-rich foods. The honey takes out the bitterness from the amla and makes it extremely delicious. It Controls Blood Sugar,
Provides Body Warmth,Helps To Cure Daily Cough And Cold
Strengthen The Immune System

Ingredients

Amla&Honey

Storage Instruction

Store in an airtight container in a dry place, away from direct sunlight.Do not Refrigerate

Shelf Life

24 months

entry.title: Organic Kombu honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vibis Honey Bee Farm
Type: Natural
Price: 480.00

 

Kombu Honey - Nature's Pure Essence

Discover the richness of Kombu Honey, collected from naturally occurring combs built by dwarf/small bees (Apis Florea). Consuming honey with warm water in the morning on an empty stomach is known to aid in weight reduction and provide a refreshing start to your day. Kombu Honey is highly rich in iron, potassium, zinc, magnesium, vitamin B2, B3, B5, B6, calcium, and vitamin C.

Enjoy the delightful taste of Kombu Honey with juice, shakes, tea, milk, bread, chapati, idly, and more. Enhance its flavor by pairing it with lemon, ginger, garlic, cinnamon, cumin, or amla.

Ingredients:

Kombu Honey

Storage Instruction:

Store in an airtight container in a dry place, away from direct sunlight. Do not refrigerate.

Shelf Life:

Indulge in the pure goodness for 24 months.

Elevate your culinary experience with the pure essence of Kombu Honey. Order now to savor the natural sweetness and health benefits.
